channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Purchase Your Bachelor and Master Regalia Now!
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store advises all Bachelor and Master candidates who will be participating in the May 2025 Commencement ceremony to place their order for regalia today. Bachelor and Master graduates can only purchase regalia from our website at rensselaerstore.com/graduation and are advised to do so before Friday, March 7, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: Optional Practical Training (OPT) Info Session | March 11
item.description: Tuesday, March 11, 2025 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM. Are you an F-1 student graduating in May 2025 and want to work in the U.S. after graduation? Optional Practical Training (OPT) might be the path for you! Students must finish the OPT Workshop for foundational knowledge before registering for OPT Info Sessions. This is the final Spring 2025 OPT Info Session. Registration is required to attend the session.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rπ Giving Day | March 14
item.description: Friday, March 14, 2025 - Rπ Giving Day will take place online, and will help support our students, our teams and student-athletes, our clubs and activities, fraternities and sororities, scholarships, and our area of greatest need – the Annual Fund. There will be competitions among your favorite teams all day long, as well as challenges and matches, and prize drawings, so be sure to join in the fun! Mark your calendar and watch your email and Rensselaer social media accounts for updates.
item.author: Community

item.title: Spring Town Meeting Scheduled for March 14th
item.description: Friday, March 14, 2025 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM. President Martin A. Schmidt ’81 invites you to attend the Spring Town Meeting on Friday, March 14, at 3 p.m. in the Curtis R. Priem Experimental Media and Performing Arts Center (EMPAC) Theater. Register at https://webforms.rpi.edu/spring-town-meeting
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work Information Session | March 7
item.description: Friday, March 7, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., will be reviewing the online, project-based graduate degrees and certificates. Expect to hear details about how RPI Instructor Mentors provide industry expertise, advice, and mentorship in a targeted and experiential learning environment. Please RSVP if you plan to attend and learn more about Rensselaer at Work.
item.author: Community

item.title: Quantum Computing Users Group Monthly Meeting
item.description: The group is oriented towards giving researchers, academics, and administrative staff a place to discuss algorithms, share coding experiences, and stay informed about research and development projects that are being conducted both on and off campus. All are welcome! If you are interested in presenting please contact Tom Morgan at morgat5@rpi.edu
item.author: Community

item.title: Celebrate the Achievements of Rensselaer Students
item.description: Nominate a deserving graduating student to recognize their exceptional contributions to the Rensselaer community through academic, athletic, and service endeavors. Their dedication has strengthened our community, and these awards provide a meaningful way to express our gratitude for their lasting impact. We welcome both self-nominations and referral applications. The nomination deadline is Friday, March 21, 2025, at 11:59 p.m., EDT.
item.author: Community

item.title: Faculty Awards Nominations | Due March 17
item.description:
All nominations for Faculty Awards are due by close of business on Monday, March 17th. All nomination form links were sent out, via email, earlier this year. If you have any questions, please contact Ashley Cohn at cohna@rpi.edu

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
